1.0.0.en: First version to support Alfen charger.

1.0.1.en: Added more capabilities and added support to update settings with flow cards.

1.0.2.en: Updated error handling. Moved some capabilities to sensors to prevent accidental changes.

1.0.3.en: New version, better error handling, supporting more capabilities and updating settings with flow cards.

1.0.7.en: Added possible fix for an issue that the login got stuck and the app crashes after a while, added new trigger (status updated).
